shot.composition: Extreme close-up (ECU) on the subject's lips, centered and perfectly sharp. Shallow depth of field (bokeh) to isolate the product application.
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Gimbal smooth motion, a very slow, subtle push-in (dolly in) to enhance intimacy and focus on the texture.. Sequence 2 (4-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

physical.posture: Head slightly tilted, focused and elegant

facial_features.eyes: Almond shape, intense gaze, subtle eye makeup
facial_features.hair: Sleek, pulled-back ponytail, dark brown color
facial_features.expression: Confident, sensual, focused on the application

wardrobe.top: High-end, black silk camisole, minimal and elegant

sequences.primary_motion: Slow, precise application of a vibrant red lipstick (Bright Red) from a sleek gold applicator onto the lower lip.
sequences.camera_follows: Close tracking of the initial action

sequences.primary_motion: The subject continues the action with increased confidence and detail. Slow, precise application of a vibrant red lipstick (Bright Red) from a sleek gold applicator onto the lower lip evolves into a more complete demonstration, showing mastery and precision.
sequences.camera_follows: Medium shot capturing the full context and environment interaction

sequences.primary_motion: The subject completes the action with a satisfied expression, looks at the result with approval, and shows a subtle smile of accomplishment. Final moment captures the positive outcome.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on facial expression and final result, ending with a confident pose

scene.location: High-end minimalist beauty studio, clean and modern aesthetic.

layout.flooring: Polished concrete or white marble, highly reflective
layout.walls: Matte white or light grey, seamless background

environment.background: Soft, out-of-focus reflections of studio lighting equipment, creating subtle geometric bokeh.
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Large softbox (Octodome) positioned slightly above and to the right of the subject.
lighting.quality: Soft diffused, high-key lighting to eliminate shadows and highlight skin texture and product shine.
lighting.key_to_fill_ratio: 2:1 (minimal contrast, very flat and flattering light)
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Vibrant, high saturation on the lipstick color (red), neutral and clean whites and skin tones.

audio.ambient: Silent studio environment, slight, distant, muffled city sounds.
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Extremely subtle, crisp sound of the lipstick applicator touching the lip, followed by a soft, luxurious 'smack' of the lips at the end.. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: N/A (Focus on foley and visual impact) The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles. Focus exclusively on the texture and application.
visual_rules.realism: Fluid athletic movements and biomechanically correct. Defined muscular anatomy with credible perspiration. Dynamic lighting accentuating physical form. Effort and intensity visible in expressions.
visual_rules.continuity: Logical progression of physical effort intensity. Consistency of perspiration and signs of fatigue. Maintenance of posture and technical form. Continuity of lighting and visible motivation.
